summary.span: 提供一个基类，要用作证据的所有对象都必须派生自该类。

span.span: Provides a base class from which all objects to be used as evidence must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，几乎任何对象无法用作 evidence 对象，如果要将它应用于证据的宿主代码。Before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], almost any object could be used as an evidence object if the hosting code wanted to apply it as evidence. 例如，某些.NET Framework 代码识别作为证据的对象。For example, some .NET Framework code recognized objects as evidence. 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 将证据对象视为引用，而且未对它们应用任何类型的安全。The common language runtime (CLR) considered evidence objects as references, and did not apply any type safety to them. 由于没有隐式限制无法在其使用类型为证据对象，这就造成问题。This presented a problem because there were implicit restrictions on which types could be used as evidence objects. 具体而言，用作证据任何对象必须是可序列化，并且不能`null`。Specifically, any object used as evidence had to be serializable and could not be `null`. 如果未满足这些要求，而 CLR 引发了异常，只要执行了所需的这些假设一个操作。If these requirements were not met, the CLR threw an exception whenever an operation that required one of these assumptions was performed. 中引入了类，该类所有的证据对象必须派生自，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]启用约束的可用作证据的对象类型，以便能够将新功能和要求添加到所有证据对象。The class, which all evidence objects must derive from, was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] to enable constraints on the types of objects that can be used as evidence and to provide the ability to add new features and requirements to all evidence objects. 类确保在实例化，时证据对象是可序列化。The class ensures, upon instantiation, that the evidence object is serializable. 此外，它使新的证据要求通过将新的默认实现添加到基类创建。In addition, it enables new evidence requirements to be created by adding new default implementations to the base class. 由 CLR 使用因为证据对象已在进行了更新的所有类型[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]为派生自。All the types used by the CLR as evidence objects have been updated in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] to derive from .
